title: Hello Kitty no Yuubinya-san Arigatou
original_name: ハローキティの 郵便屋さんありがとう
sinopse: Kitty's and Mimmy's class find out that Yuubinya-san, their town's postal worker, is having a hard time delivering the mail in his old age. They try to give him a gift as a thank you for all his years of hard work.
